secText: When you click on the card, you will start a 3-D car driving simulation.  We want you to drive the car using acceleration, not velocity.

To have the keys control acceleration, not velocity, press Ctrl + A. The up arrow key will now increase acceleration, and the down arrow key will reduce acceleration, including making it increasingly negative. The maximum acceleration magnitude is 3 m/s2.

The car starts with a positive velocity.  How do you make it go faster when it is moving in the positive direction? When it is moving in the negative direction?  How can you turn the car around using acceleration when the velocity is positive?  when it is negative?
